Name: Love In Drawing
About the game: Reflect and draw! Love In Drawing is a game that aims to make you reflect to solve levels where you need to gather red and blue balls. The goal remains simple in appearance, but the more you advance in the levels and the more your brain will be strained! Will you be able to finish all levels? Features: ■ 100 different levels! ■ Difficulty variable! ■ Addictive gameplay! ■ Good music!
